doc.name: the
doc.summary: Appears before the names of properties and the names of functions that are not followed by parentheses

examples.example: set the script of me to field "Script Contents"
put the date into field "Current Date"

description.p: Use the the keyword to unambiguously indicate how an expression should be parsed.
The the keyword is mandatory before the names of built-in functions, unless the parentheses form of the function is used:

code.i: -- must use "the" if () are not used

description.p: The the keyword is optional before the names of properties, but it is good style to include it.
